evidence.text: Plaintiff United States of America hereby dismisses the above-captioned case pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 41(a)(1). The United States has determined not to proceed further in this matter.

the plaintiff’s voluntary dismissal of a case under Rule 41(a)(1)(A)(i) before the defendant either files an answer or moves for summary judgment is 'self-executing, i.e., it is effective at the moment the notice is filed with the clerk and no judicial approval is required.'
